known_issues: Cancel button on “Welcome to lockedin” popup is not working

existing_features.title: Fix the non-working cancel/close behavior on the “Welcome to LockedIn!” goal library popup so the user can reliably dismiss it without selecting or adding any goals.

Update the “Welcome to LockedIn!” goal library popup layout and sizing to be mobile-responsive so it fits effectively on small screens (no clipped content, no unusable fixed heights, and primary actions remain accessible).

Make the top-left app logo in the header always function as a “go to homepage” control: when clicked, it should take the user to the homepage experience (for authenticated users, return to the Dashboard home section; for unauthenticated users, return to the public HomePage).

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix non-working Cancel button on “Welcome to lockedin” popup
Make “Welcome to lockedin” popup mobile-friendly/responsive sizing and layout
Ensure top-left app logo always redirects to homepage when clicked

projectName: Fix Welcome popup cancel behavior, make popup mobile-friendly, and make header logo always return to homepage
